description: This file defines a React component for a note editing page, including loader and action functions for fetching, updating, and deleting notes via API calls. It handles auto-saving, form submission, and user interactions within the note editing interface.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches a note by noteId from the API and returns it as JSON for initial data loading.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submissions for updating or deleting a note based on the submitted form data.

methods.name: NoteEditorPage
methods.description: React component for editing a note with auto-save and delete functionalities.
